items.question: How do I register on the site?
items.answer: To register, click the 'Create account' button and fill out the form with your email and password.

items.question: How do I change my password?
items.answer: Go to your account settings and select 'Change password', then follow the instructions.

items.question: How is my data protected?
items.answer: All data is encrypted using modern SSL/TLS standards and stored in a secure database.

items.question: What should I do if I suspect a hack?
items.answer: Immediately contact our support team and change your password.

items.question: Can I delete my account?
items.answer: Yes, you can delete your account in the settings. After that, all your data will be removed.
